title: Composition
credit_line: Gift of the Junior Council of the Women's Committee
provenance_text:
Wolfgang Hollegha [b. 1929], Vienna, Austria, until February 1959 [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 213, illustrated, plate 56) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. See Note [2].
[2]. The museum's Junior Council of the Women's Committee purchased the painting from the 1958 International as a gift for Carnegie Institute. The museum accessioned the painting on November 21, 1958; however, payment to the artist was sent on February 24, 1959.
